title: Central Kuala Lumpur Mercure City Break with Daily Buffet Breakfast
description:
Positioned on the fringe of Kuala Lumpur’s lively Bukit Bintang shopping district is the sophisticated Mercure Kuala Lumpur Shaw Parade, a city oasis at the centre of the action. Embrace sky-high living as you sip cocktails by the rooftop pool, savour global flavours at Chorak restaurant and keep up with your routine at the onsite fitness centre. When you're ready to explore, you'll have the privilege of choice with all of Kuala Lumpur’s charm just a stone's throw away.

Bursting at the seams with unbelievable shopping, popular hawker stalls with aromatic smells of delicious food, grand mosques and a modern city with the world-famous, architectural giant of the Petronas Towers at its centre, Kuala Lumpur is a feast for the senses. When it comes to retail haunts, Mercure Kuala Lumpur Shaw Parade is located steps from Berjaya Times Square and the luxurious Pavilion KL.
offer_address: 152 Jalan Changkat Thambi Dollah, Pudu, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

vendor_name: Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel & Residences
title: Kuala Lumpur Sky-High Sophistication in the Heart of the City with Daily Breakfast & Club Lounge Access
description: Soar above the horizon to become spellbound by the capital's unrivalled atmosphere at the five-star Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel & Residences. Situated near the award-winning Pavilion Kuala Lumpur shopping mall - and just a five-minute drive from the Golden Triangle, the city’s premier shopping, entertainment and business district - you'll have the privilege of choice with all of Kuala Lumpur’s charm just a stone's throw away.  Embrace sky-high living as you sip cocktails next to the rooftop pool, dig into handmade dim sum at Red Chinese Cuisine or tuck into delicious tapas at Blu Bar & Cigars.
location_description: Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel & Residences
offer_address: 4 Jalan Conlay, Kuala Lumpur 50450, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Kuala Lumpur Sunway City Escape with One-Time Lunch, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Seamlessly integrated with the Sunway City theme park, the opulent Sunway Resort Hotel offers guests the convenience of exploring elegant shopping and thrilling rides just moments away. Just a 20-minute drive from the thriving metropolis of Kuala Lumpur, this family-friendly resort is where Malay culture meets exciting adventure. Discover nature on the canopy walk, delight in the fun of Sunway Lagoon Theme Park, shop 'til you drop at the Sunway Pyramid mall and when it's time to wind down, chill by one of the world's largest surf pools or indulge at the spa - there really is something for everyone.

Nearby, explore the vibrant city of Kuala Lumpur - jam-packed full of ultra-modern shopping centres, soaring towers and cutting-edge restaurants. Weave your way through the Golden Triangle district, home of the famous Petronas Towers, or retreat to your stylish hotel to savour gastronomic delights across six distinctive dining venues, including the renowned Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill.
offer_address: 1 Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, Selangor Darul Ehsan 47500, Malaysia

title: Sky-High Kuala Lumpur Shangri-La Elegance in the Golden Triangle District with Daily Breakfast
description: If you've never before been to Kuala Lumpur, know there’s one district you simply shouldn't miss - jam-packed full of ultramodern shopping centres, soaring towers and cutting-edge restaurants, the ‘Golden Triangle’ is a Malaysian revelation. Shangri-La Hotel Kuala Lumpur stands tall at the heart of it all, a spellbindingly elegant gateway to the city’s very best. Take elegant high tea among the Lobby Lounge's lush, fountained gardens, experience authentic Japanese omakase at Zipangu and savour a tropical paradise hidden at the top of the city, surrounding the hotel’s palm-fringed rooftop pool. For an extra tasty bite of luxury, upgrade to the Premier Selection Suite - the views over Kuala Lumpur's shimmering skyline are beyond spectacular.
offer_address: 11 Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Stylish Kuala Lumpur Escape near Petronas Towers
description: Overlooking the spectacular Kuala Lumpur skyline and the iconic Petronas Towers, the elegant serviced apartments of Oakwood Hotel & Residence Kuala Lumpur boast one of the best locations in town. The hotel opens up to a precinct of parks, cafés, restaurants and award-winning rooftop bars on Jalan Ampang, one of the best nightlife locations in Kuala Lumpur and the perfect launchpad to discover this vibrant city's charms. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast and MYR75 food and drink credit to use at the onsite TrEat Restaurant & Bar.
offer_address: 222 Jalan Ampang, Kampung Datuk Keramat, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: High-End Sofitel Glamour with Club Access, Nightly Cocktails & Daily Afternoon Tea
description: From soaring skyscrapers to botanical gardens and museums, the recently opened Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Damansara brings the city’s best attractions right to your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Kuala Lumpur with an ultra-chic stay at the newest addition to the Sofitel family, and treat yourself to exclusive VIP club privileges. Includes a leisurely late 2pm checkout and exclusive access to Club Millésime Lounge with daily breakfast, daily afternoon tea, nightly cocktails and canapes, wine tastings and more.
offer_address: No 6 Jalan Damanlela Bukit Damansara , 50490 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: Glamorous Five-Star Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Damansara Stay with Exclusive Club Millésime Access
description: From soaring skyscrapers to botanical gardens and museums, the Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Damansara brings the city’s best attractions right to your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Kuala Lumpur with an ultra-chic stay at Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Damansara. Treat yourself to exclusive club privileges and indulge in daily breakfast, daily afternoon tea, nightly cocktails and canapes, a leisurely late 2pm checkout and more.
offer_address: 6 Jalan Damanlela, Bukit Damansara, Kuala Lumpur 50490, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur Sky-High Opulence Minutes from Petronas Towers with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Immerse yourself in the shimmering lights and cosmopolitan allure of Malaysia's capital at this exquisite luxury hotel, nestled in the heart of Kuala Lumpur's Golden Triangle. This five-star marvel graces the skyline with its striking modern architecture and an array of world-class amenities.

Imagine yourself unwinding in the breathtaking 29th-floor infinity pool, where you can swim amid sweeping city views, or indulging in culinary perfection at Kampachi, renowned for its unparalleled sushi. Fitness enthusiasts can enjoy the world-class Sanctum fitness centre to keep you energised and balanced throughout your stay.

Elevate your evening with a signature cocktail at the chic rooftop bar, offering panoramic views that will leave you spellbound, or escape to the Sanctum Spa, a sanctuary of serenity with a tropical monsoon shower, Himalayan salt sauna and aromatherapy steam bath.

At EQ Kuala Lumpur, you’re perfectly positioned in the city’s trendiest shopping, dining and entertainment district. Whether visiting for business or leisure, you’ll find the location unparalleled, with the iconic Petronas Towers just moments away.
offer_address: Equatorial Plaza, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Glamorous Kuala Lumpur City Escape with Club Lounge Access
description:
The best of Kuala Lumpur is on your doorstep at Meliá Kuala Lumpur, an ultra-glam hotel boasting an unrivalled location in the heart of it all. Embrace the vibrant energy of KL and soak up all the sights from soaring skyscrapers to botanical gardens and museums. Enjoy daily breakfast and access to The Level Lounge and all its benefits including personalised express check-in and check-out, welcome drinks, all-day refreshments with freshly-brewed coffee, teas and cookies, nightly free-flow cocktail hour from 4pm to 6pm, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, daily newspapers and magazine, nightly turndown service and complimentary laundering of two garments per day.

**Looking for spectacular views?** Upgrade to the top-floor The Level Room, boasting panoramic views over Kuala Lumpur.
offer_address: 16, Jalan Imbi, Bukit Bintang, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: Experience One of Malaysia's Top Luxury Hotels
description: Experience old-world glamour with a stay at one of Malaysia’s top luxury hotels, the historic Majestic Hotel in Kuala Lumpur. Stay in a beautiful Colonial-style suite with wooden floorboards and a claw-footed bath, with exclusive Majestic Club privileges, including breakfasts delivered to your suite each morning by your butler, afternoon snacks, evening cocktails, 24-hour butler service and more.
offer_address: 5, Jalan Sultan Hishamuddin, Tasik Perdana, 50000 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur Sunway City Family Fun with Club Lounge Access, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
This opulent resort offers family fun wrapped up in VIP luxuries, including daily access to the adults-only 20th Club Lounge or the family-friendly Premier Leisure Club with daily Kids Club entertainment. Just a 20-minute drive from the thriving metropolis of Kuala Lumpur, this is where Malay culture meets family adventure.

After swimming under the main pool's waterfall, or splashing in the Waterventure Kids Pool, gather your crew for culinary delights at any of the six distinctive dining venues, which include the renowned Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill and Gordon Ramsay Street Pizza.

Discover nature on the canopy walk or weave your way through the Golden Triangle district, home of the famous Petronas Towers. Shop 'til you drop at the Sunway Pyramid mall, and when it's time to wind down, chill by one of the world's largest surf pools or indulge at the spa - there really is something for everyone.
offer_address: 1 Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, Selangor Darul Ehsan 47500, Malaysia

title: Top-Rated Kuala Lumpur Luxury with Rooftop Cocktails, Room Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up the glittering lights and cosmopolitan glamour of Malaysia’s capital city from EQ Kuala Lumpur, a luxury hotel in the heart of the city near the iconic PETRONAS Twin Towers - currently rated the number one hotel in Kuala Lumpur on Tripadvisor. Boasting a wide range of world-class facilities, this urban oasis is home to award-winning restaurants such as the celebrated Kampachi Japanese and the top-floor Sabayon, which boasts some of the finest views in the city. Sip a signature cocktail at the rooftop bar with stunning vistas of the skyline, float around in the 29th-floor infinity pool and pamper yourself with an invigorating spa treatment at the Sanctum Spa.

This luxurious hotel is conveniently located within Kuala Lumpur's Golden Triangle, meaning the city's vibrant nightlife and popular attractions are just a short walk away. With bustling street vendors, fantastic night markets, and one of the best shopping districts in Southeast Asia, you’ll be spoilt for choice when discovering this eclectic city.
offer_address: Equatorial Plaza, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Lavish Kuala Lumpur 5-Star Luxury with Rooftop Drinks, Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Minibar
description: Soak up the glittering lights and cosmopolitan glamour of Malaysia’s capital city from EQ Kuala Lumpur, a luxury hotel conveniently located in the city's Golden Triangle near the iconic Petronas Twin Towers. This urban oasis is home to award-winning restaurants such as the celebrated Kampachi Japanese and the top-floor Sabayon, which showcases some of the finest views in the city. Sip on a refreshing drink at the rooftop Sky51 bar with stunning vistas of the skyline and indulge in an evening of fine dining, float around in the 29th-floor infinity pool and pamper yourself with an invigorating treatment at Sanctum Spa. With the city's vibrant nightlife and one of the best shopping districts in Southeast Asia just a short walk away, you’ll be spoilt for choice when discovering this eclectic city.
offer_address: Equatorial Plaza, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Massages & Club Access with Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
From the iconic heights of the PETRONAS Twin Towers to the historic temples and vibrant markets of the past, immerse yourself in the sights of Malaysia’s dynamic capital from this hotel. Located in one of Kuala Lumpur’s most upscale neighbourhoods, Damansara Heights - voted one of the coolest neighbourhoods in the world by Lonely Planet - you’ll be perfectly positioned to explore the city. 

This area is well-connected and filled with fine-dining restaurants, trendy bars and unique boutique shops. After a day of exploration, retreat to your luxurious sanctuary, complete with a range of amenities including a stunning swimming pool, offering an urban oasis amidst the glittering towers of Damansara. 

Unwind at the Sofitel SPA, or enjoy exquisite dining at five different restaurants and chic cocktails at Le Bar Cocktail & Stories.
offer_address: 6 Jalan Damanlela, Bukit Damansara, Kuala Lumpur 50490, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Massages, Club Access & Two-Hour Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
From the heights of the Petronas Twin Towers to the temples and vibrant markets of the past, immerse yourself in the sights of Malaysia’s dynamic capital from this glamorous sanctuary. Nestled in one of Kuala Lumpur’s most upscale neighbourhoods, Damansara Heights, you’ll be perfectly positioned to explore the city.

After a day of exploration, retreat to your refined abode, complete with a stunning outdoor pool that offers an urban oasis amid the glittering towers of Kuala Lumpur. Unwind at the Sofitel Spa, work up a sweat at the fitness centre, enjoy exquisite dining across three restaurants and two bars, or sip chic cocktails at Club Millesime.
offer_address: 6 Jalan Damanlela, Bukit Damansara, Kuala Lumpur 50490, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur Five-Star Eco-Wellness Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Daily Club Lounge Access
description:
Immerse yourself in the shimmering lights and cosmopolitan allure of Malaysia’s capital at this exquisite luxury hotel, nestled in the heart of Kuala Lumpur’s Golden Triangle. This eco-friendly urban retreat graces the skyline with its striking architecture and an array of world-class amenities. During your stay, dine at the three exceptional onsite restaurants, or embrace holistic wellness at the on-site Urban Farm, St. Gregory Spa and outdoor swimming pool.

Best of all, the entire hotel is run with sustainability in mind, with biodegradable packaging and air-purifying plants and trees serving as natural humidifiers.

When you’re not soaking up the five-star amenities, step out into the vibrant city and find yourself at the heart of it all. Visit the famed Petronas Twin Towers or explore the lively Jalan Alor Food Street, where authentic local delights await.

As the night unfolds, dive into the city's eclectic nightlife at Changkat Bukit Bintang. From culture to cuisine, this opulent stay offers an unforgettable adventure right outside your door.
offer_address: Jalan Sultan Ismail, Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur Golden Triangle Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Cocktail at Open-Air Rooftop Bar
description: Soak up the glittering lights and cosmopolitan glamour of Malaysia’s capital city from the comfort of this luxury five-star hotel in the heart of the Golden Triangle. Currently rated the number one hotel in Kuala Lumpur on Tripadvisor, this sleek, urban oasis boasts a wide range of world-class facilities, including award-winning restaurants such as the celebrated Kampachi Japanese and the top-floor Sabayon, which boasts some of the finest views in the city. Sip a signature cocktail at the rooftop bar with stunning vistas of the skyline, float around in the 29th-floor infinity pool and pamper yourself with an invigorating spa treatment at the Sanctum Spa.
offer_address: Equatorial Plaza, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Sky-High Sheraton Kuala Lumpur Escape with VIP Club Access
description: Experience the sophisticated luxury of Sheraton Imperial Kuala Lumpur, recently reopened following a multimillion-dollar transformation. Enjoy a location in the heart of Kuala Lumpur’s city centre with easy access to the Petronas Twin Towers, shopping malls, the LRT and monorail stations. Check into a sought-after Club Room with captivating city views and enjoy exclusive access to the Club Lounge with daily breakfast, nightly free-flow alcoholic drinks with chef’s selection canapés, all-day refreshments and afternoon snacks.
offer_address: Jalan Sultan Ismail, Chow Kit, 50250 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: Stay at Kuala Lumpur's #1 Hotel with Sky-High Club Access
description:
From soaring skyscrapers to botanical gardens and bustling markets, the best of Kuala Lumpur is at your fingertips from EQ Kuala Lumpur - a luxurious, newly opened hotel already ranked #1 in the city on TripAdvisor. Enjoy a location in the heart of it all, with easy access to the iconic PETRONAS Twin Towers, shopping malls, the LRT and monorail stations.

Check in to a sought-after Deluxe Room with captivating views and enjoy access to the Equator Club Lounge - perched on the 50th floor of the hotel - with daily breakfast, daily afternoon tea, free-flow alcoholic drinks (5.30pm to 7.30pm) along with chef’s selection canapés, all-day refreshments and afternoon snacks, a dedicated concierge service and express check-in and out. Plus, indulge with one buffet lunch for two at Nipah restaurant, a welcome mocktail at the glamorous rooftop bar Blue and a 10% discount on blissful spa treatments.
offer_address: Equatorial Plaza, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Kuala Lumpur Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Let The RuMa Hotel and Residences become your five-star home in the heart of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia's vibrant capital. This serene sanctuary is set within the heart of the Golden Triangle neighbourhood and is mere moments from a plethora of exceptional eateries and bars, high-end shopping malls, and of course, the unmissable Petronas Twin Towers. Eye-catching copper elements woven across all corners of the slick and luxurious hotel won't go unnoticed, along with a warm atmosphere that has been intentionally crafted to capture all the intimacy of a home run by an accomplished host.

Take a culinary journey through modern Malaysian cuisine at ATAS, the hotel's signature restaurant, spearheaded by Executive Chef Tyson Gee. ATAS' seasonal menu focuses on the freshest local ingredients and authentic herbs and spices, creating stunning dishes such as raw beef tartare, dry-aged duck breast and jasmine rice salad. For relaxed drinks with a view, SEVEN Lobby Bar and Lounge offers an array of handcrafted cocktails, and after long city days, you can find your version of wellness across the hotel. Whether that means sweating it out at the state-of-the-art gym, discovering ancient healing therapies at UR SPA or taking a refreshing dip in the hotel's pool.
offer_address: 7, Jalan Kia Peng, Kuala Lumpur, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

vendor_name: Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel & Residences
title: Kuala Lumpur Sky-High Sophistication in the Heart of the City with Executive Club Lounge Access
description:
Soar above the horizon and become captivated with this city’s pioneering style and unrivalled atmosphere at Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel & Residences. Embrace sky-high living as you sip cocktails on the 10th floor next to the rooftop pool, dig into unconventional flavours at Red Chinese Cuisine or sink into plush armchairs and relax over tapas at Blu Bar & Cigars. Keep up with your routine at the onsite Fit Lounge, complete with tropical garden views, and let yourself melt the day away with a soothing massage at Vibes Spa.

This hotel is situated near the award-winning Pavilion Kuala Lumpur shopping mall and is located just a five-minute drive from the Golden Triangle - the city’s premier shopping, entertainment and business district, and the home of the famous Petronas Towers. Stay here and have the privilege of choice with all of Kuala Lumpur’s charm just a stone's throw away.
location_description: Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel & Residences
offer_address: 4 Jalan Conlay, Kuala Lumpur 50450, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Experience the elegant fusion of Malaysian culture and French art de vivre at this sophisticated oasis of urban luxury, ensconced in Kuala Lumpur's lavish Damansara Hills neighbourhood, a stone's throw from the city's financial and commercial hubs. 

This architectural gem from Sofitel offers unrivalled hospitality and boasts bespoke rooms with spa style bathrooms, a glimmering outdoor pool, state of the art fitness centre, steam room and Sofitel SPA offering hammam baths and refined French cosmetology.

Embark on a culinary journey across the hotel's restaurants and bars: from pan-Asian delicacies with a French twist at Kwee Zeen and celebrated Cantonese fare at Wan Chun Ting to trendy poolside cocktails and light bites at Nizza Pool Bar, there is much to savour. 

If you wish to explore the delights of central Kuala Lumpur, including the Petaling Street Market, soaring Petronas Twin Towers and vibrant Bukit Bintang precinct, the hotel is conveniently located just two stops from Kuala Lumpur Sentral station and five stops from Bukit Bintang MRT station.
offer_address: 6 Jalan Damanlela, Bukit Damansara, Kuala Lumpur 50490, Malaysia

title: City Break in the Heart of Kuala Lumpur's Premier Shopping District
description: Selamat Datang or Welcome to your Malaysia city break at the contemporary Mercure Kuala Lumpur Shaw Parade. Ideally located at the fringe of Kuala Lumpur’s Bukit Bintang - home to the vibrant Jalan Alor night market - and a short walk from the iconic Bintang Walk shopping belt, Berjaya Times Square, Lot 10 and Pavillion. Explore the hustle and bustle of Malaysia’s vibrant capital staying in an upgraded Executive Room with daily buffet breakfast for two, a 20% food and beverage discount to use at any on-site restaurant throughout your stay, a MYR40 drink voucher for the Lobby Lounge and guaranteed late 2pm checkout, so you can take advantage of the plethora of sights and experiences at your fingertips.
offer_address: 152 Jalan Changkat Thambi Dollah, Pudu, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: Sophisticated Kuala Lumpur Escape with Five-Star Day Spa
description: Experience an idyllic inner-city escape located close to Kuala Lumpur’s most inspiring attractions. Offering dramatic views from its position between Petronas Twin Towers and Kuala Lumpur City Centre (KLCC) Park, take time to enjoy access to the hotel’s high-end facilities, including a five-star day spa and seven top-tier dining venues. Unwind at the infinity pool overlooking the KLCC park, or relax in the shade of a poolside cabana.
offer_address: Kuala Lumpur City Centre, 50088 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: Top-Rated Kuala Lumpur Luxe City Escape with City Views & Sky-High Infinity Pool
description:
Featuring glamourous bars and restaurants, a 25-metre infinity pool and a long list of state-of-the-art facilities, it's easy to see why this luxurious retreat is heralded as Malaysia's top city hotel. Surrounded by the lofty heights of the glittering Petronas Towers, historic temples, the KL Tower and high-end stores, you can soak up the sights of Malaysia's dynamic capital in absolute opulence.

At EQ Kuala Lumpur, every detail is meticulously crafted so you can enjoy the finer things in life. Experience five-star Malaysian hospitality accompanied by ultra-modern design, the city's best sustainability, an award-winning spa, gourmet dining and an impressive collection of fine artworks.

Flying high above the city skyline within the Golden Triangle - Kuala Lumpur’s main shopping and nightlife district - this 52-storey building boasts sweeping views from every angle. Open the hotel’s doors and embrace the vibrant KL - explore the Batu Caves, take a breath at the nearby forest reserve and feel the electric atmosphere of the thriving nightlife.
offer_address: EQ, Equatorial Plaza, Jalan Sultan Ismail, 50250 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

vendor_name: Novotel Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel
title: Modern Kuala Lumpur Novotel Stay near Petronas Twin Towers with Outdoor Pool
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Malaysia's capital city with a stylish stay in the heart of Kuala Lumpur's Golden Triangle. Conveniently positioned for easy access to the bustling Petaling Street Market and the architectural marvel of the Petronas Twin Towers, this modern hotel keeps you close to the city's endless action.

Indulge in a range of local and international flavours at the onsite Food Exchange restaurant, or grab a refreshing drink at Gourmet Bar. Cool off in the glittering outdoor pool or take a short stroll to the vibrant Bukit Bintang district, renowned for its shopping, dining and nightlife.
offer_address: 2 Jalan Kia Peng, Kuala Lumpur 50450, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Kuala Lumpur InterContinental Luxury Moments from the Petronas Towers
description: The splendor of the five-star InterContinental Kuala Lumpur is undeniable: a huge lobby sparkles with a statement art fixture, an expansive swimming pool is a cooling respite from the day's heat and the city's best sites are all within close proximity. During a stay, indulge in award-winning dining at Tatsu Japanese Cuisine and Tao Chinese Cuisine, or unwind with a cocktail or tapas at  the Serena Brasserie and OneSixFive Lounge.
location_description: InterContinental Kuala Lumpur, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 165 Jalan Ampang, Kuala Lumpur, 50450, Malaysia

vendor_name: Pavilion Hotel by Banyan Tree, Kuala Lumpur
title: Five-Star Kuala Lumpur Luxury in the Heart of the City with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
In the heart of Malaysia's capital city, you'll find the five-star Pavilion Hotel Kuala Lumpur Managed by Banyan Tree, a glitzy hotel in the centre of bustling Bukit Bintang. There's plenty to keep you busy during your stay: opt for a spot of retail therapy at the onsite Banyan Tree Retail Shop, take a dip in the rooftop infinity pool (an incredible 18 floors above ground level), and leave the little ones to have fun at Rangers Club while you enjoy a tipple at the bar. When hunger strikes, there are four exceptional eateries available to treat your tastebuds.

The hotel is located in the middle of Kuala Lumpur's buzzing business and entertainment district, which means the best attractions, restaurants and shops are at your fingertips. Kuala Lumpur's landmark Petronas Twin Towers are just around the corner, Jalan Alor's vibrant market stalls, coffee shops and restaurants are within a 10-minute walk, and the Pavilion Mall is just an elevator ride away.
location_description: Pavilion Hotel Kuala Lumpur Managed by Banyan Tree
offer_address: 170, Bukit Bintang St, Bukit Bintang, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Kuala Lumpur City Centre
title: Vibrant Malaysia City Escape in the Heart of Kuala Lumpur
description: Take on Malaysia’s sky-high metropolis from your base at Holiday Inn Express Kuala Lumpur City Centre, an IHG Hotel. This dynamic city is best known for hosting some of the world's tallest buildings - visit the Kuala Lumpur Tower Observation Deck and brave the altitude for stunning views, or watch the Petronas Towers glimmer from the expansive Suria KLCC shopping mall. Stop to work out at the hotel’s fitness centre or refuel in the Great Room and continue your journey recharged.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Kuala Lumpur City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 84 Jalan Raja Chulan, Kuala Lumpur, 50200 Malaysia

title: Boutique Kuala Lumpur Sanctuary in City's Golden Triangle
description: Luxury is redefined with a stay at The Chow Kit, a boutique escape sitting in the heart of Kuala Lumpur. Perched in an emerging neighbourhood once known for its gambling dens, this modern marvel is ideally located to experience the best of the city, with mouthwatering street food, bustling markets and artisan boutiques on your doorstep. The onsite restaurant and bar celebrates the multiculturalism of Malaysia, with recipes passed down from generations.
location_description: The Chow Kit - an Ormond Hotel
offer_address: 1012 Jalan Sultan Ismail, Chow Kit, 50100 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

description:
Dive right into the dynamic energy of Malaysia's capital city from this elegant retreat. Ideally located in the bustling district of Trion, the property provides easy access to a plethora of vibrant eateries, boutiques and cultural landmarks. Perched on levels 38 and above, its meticulously designed rooms and suites provide sweeping vistas of the city's skyline.

Explore the nearby Petronas Twin Towers, savour local delicacies at Jalan Alor Food Street, or delve into history at the National Museum. Just a short drive from the city centre and major attractions, the hotel ensures convenience for both leisure and business travellers.

Indulge with a myriad of dining options available across seven distinct precincts, while the hotel's spectacular rooms, suites, and villas promise to create cherished memories for the entire family.

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Kuala Lumpur City Centre
title: Ultra-Modern Kuala Lumpur Stay with Rooftop Pool & Restaurant
description: Dive into the heart of Malaysia's capital at the ultra-modern Crowne Plaza Kuala Lumpur City Centre. This contemporary haven is ideally situated for exploring the city's rich cultural tapestry, with the iconic Petronas Twin Towers and bustling Jalan Alor food street just a stone's throw away. Savour a symphony of flavours at the hotel's signature restaurant, or unwind in the rooftop pool. As night falls, retreat to your sumptuous suite, where floor-to-ceiling windows reveal breathtaking city views.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Kuala Lumpur City Centre, an IHG hotel
offer_address: No 22, Menara 8, Kuala Lumpur 50450, Malaysia

title: Modern Kuala Lumpur Stay near Petronas Twin Towers with Rooftop Pool with Bar
description:
Positioned on the fringe of Kuala Lumpur’s lively Bukit Bintang shopping district, this city oasis is at the centre of the action. Embrace sky-high living and sip on cocktails by the rooftop pool, grab an elegant cocktail at the Lobby Lounge, or savour global flavours at the Chorak Restaurant.

When you're ready to explore, you can enjoy all of just a stone's throw away. Bursting at the seams with unbelievable shopping, popular hawker stalls and architectural wonders like the world-famous Petronas Towers, this hotel is the perfect gateway to enjoy all of Kuala Lumpur’s charm. When it comes to retail haunts, the hotel is located steps from the Berjaya Times Square and the high-end Pavilion Kuala Lumpur.
offer_address: 152 Jalan Changkat Thambi Dollah, Pudu, Kuala Lumpur 55100, Malaysia

title: Sophisticated Kuala Lumpur Apartment Escape near Petronas Towers
description: Overlooking the iconic Petronas Towers and the spectacular city skyline, the elegant serviced apartments of Oakwood Hotel & Residence Kuala Lumpur boast an unrivalled location in historic Jalan Ampang's leafy Embassy Row. Surrounded by a dazzling spread of parks, restaurants and rooftop bars, it's the perfect base to explore Malaysia's vibrant capital. Treat yourself to authentic plates at Treat Restaurant or laze the day away by the hotel's shimmering outdoor pool.
offer_address: 222 Jalan Ampang, Kuala Lumpur 50450 Malaysia

title: Five-Star Kuala Lumpur Luxury with Poolside Al Fresco Restaurant & Bar
description: Kuala Lumpur is a whirlwind of activity, home to soaring skyscrapers, street-food stalls, spiraling minarets and banyan trees - see it all when you stay at PARKROYAL COLLECTION Kuala Lumpur. During your stay, dine at the three exceptional onsite restaurants: sink your teeth into Mediterranean and Asian fusion fare at the al fresco Skye Chill, dine amid Thyme's seven open kitchens, and sip tropical cocktails in the low-lit and sultry The Botanist Lounge & Bar.
offer_address: Jalan Sultan Ismail, Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur Urban Oasis near Petronas Twin Towers with Rooftop Pool & SkyBar
description: For soaring city views, Traders Hotel Kuala Lumpur by Shangri-La serves up incredible urban panoramas alongside a convenient central location, friendly service and fabulous facilities. Stay right in the heart of the city's main commercial district, close to the Petronas Twin Towers, KLCC Park and Bukit Bintang shopping precinct. For moments of stillness, ascend to the rooftop spa for relaxing treatments, a steam bath or a sauna session. For a tipple or two with incredible Twin Tower views, the SkyBar’s sultry lounge is the perfect spot for a glamorous evening. When hunger strikes, head to Gobo Upstairs Lounge & Grill for succulent steaks grilled to perfection, or Gobo Chit Chat for mouthwatering international fare. Plus, the rooftop swimming pool surrounded by sun-soaked loungers and sky-high health club with state-of-the-art equipment ensure you can stay active during your stay.
offer_address: City Centre, Kuala Lumpur 50088, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur All-Suite Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Discover the best of Malaysia's capital city when you stay at PARKROYAL Serviced Suites Kuala Lumpur, with all-suite apartment-style-living in the heart of the Golden Triangle. Shop 'til you drop with KLCC and Pavilion shopping malls within walking distance, or dine on delicious Malaysian, Indian and Chinese fare aplenty in this bustling metropolis. Enjoy a leisurely swim in the outdoor rooftop pool on level 31, or if you have kids in tow, enjoy family fun time in the dedicated kids' play area.
offer_address: No. 1 Jalan Nagasari, off Jalan Raja Chulan, Kuala Lumpur 50200, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Shangri-La Indulgence in the Heart of Kuala Lumpur
description: Wake up in Malaysia's vibrant capital city in signature luxury at the five-star Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur. Perfectly located in the heart of the action, it's all too easy to get up and embark on daily explorations, or simply spend a day resting among the fabulous facilities of this hotel. Relax by the outdoor swimming pool on a lounger, or spend a day at The Spa and treat yourself to a massage, reflexology treatment or a soothing facial. There's an abundance of tailored family activities on offer to keep the whole clan entertained, from family yoga to arts and crafts. When it's time to grab a bite, there are eight excellent restaurants and bars onsite to choose from, including international buffets, Cantonese fine dining and a Manhattan-style steakhouse.
offer_address: 11, Jln Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur, 50250 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

title: Kuala Lumpur Urban Retreat in the Heart of Bangsar with Sky-High Pool
description:
Experience the vibrancy of Kuala Lumpur from a tranquil urban sanctuary, perched high above the city's bustling streets. This high-end hotel is ideally located in the cosmopolitan district of Bangsar, just a stone's throw from the city's best shopping, dining and nightlife.

Savour the city's culinary delights at the nearby Jalan Alor Food Street, or explore the cultural richness of the Brickfields, known as Kuala Lumpur's Little India. Back at the hotel take a dip in the sky-high pool and enjoy a drink at the stylish bar, or retreat to your spacious, elegantly designed room for a restful night's sleep.
offer_address: 58 Jalan Ang Seng, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Kuala Lumpur 50470, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Glamour with Spa & Five Restaurants & Bars
description:
From the iconic heights of the PETRONAS Twin Towers to the historic temples and vibrant markets of the past, immerse yourself in the sights of Malaysia’s dynamic capital from this elegant retreat. Located in one of Kuala Lumpur’s most upscale neighbourhoods, Damansara Heights - voted one of the coolest neighbourhoods in the world by Lonely Planet - you’ll be perfectly positioned to explore the city.

After a day of exploration, retreat to your luxurious sanctuary, complete with a stunning swimming pool, offering an urban oasis amidst the glittering towers of Damansara. Unwind at the Sofitel SPA, or enjoy exquisite dining at five different restaurants, before sipping on a nightcap at Le Bar Cocktail & Stories.
offer_address: 6 Jalan Damanlela, Bukit Damansara, Kuala Lumpur, 50490, Malaysia

title: Modern Retreat near Kuala Lumpur with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
Immerse yourself in the cultural richness of Malaysia with a stay at this contemporary retreat in the heart of Selayang, just a short drive from Kuala Lumpur city centre. Boasting a rooftop infinity pool with 180-degree city views, a well-equipped gym and an Asian buffet restaurant, everything you need is within reach.

Just a short distance from the Batu Caves, one of Malaysia's most popular Hindu shrines, this hotel is the ideal base for cultural exploration. For a taste of local cuisine, venture to the nearby Selayang Wet Market, where a myriad of food stalls serve up authentic Malaysian dishes.
offer_address: No B G 12, Dataran Emerald, Jalan Ps 11, Prima Selayang, Batu Caves, Selangor 68100, Malaysia

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Kuala Lumpur on the Park, an IHG Hotel
title: Chic Kuala Lumpur Escape with Views of the World’s Second Tallest Building
description: Hotel Indigo Kuala Lumpur on the Park, an IHG Hotel, has largely been designed to mirror the chic, contemporary culture of the bustling Bukit Nanas vicinity, where a myriad of thrilling local adventures await. Feast your eyes over Merdeka 118, the world's second tallest building, and the Kuala Lumper Tower from this centrally located haven. Elegantly prepared rooms welcome you with warmth alongside an idyllic pool and a late-night fitness centre.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Kuala Lumpur on the Park, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 5, Jalan Puncak, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Sky-High Five-Star Kuala Lumpur Oasis in the Heart of the Golden Triangle
description:
Experience Malaysia's vibrant capital from the five-star Banyan Tree Kuala Lumpur, a luxurious sky-high oasis in the heart of the city's Golden Triangle. Enjoy sweeping views across Kuala Lumpur's gleaming cityscape, treat yourself to spiritual renewal at the relaxing wellness spa or dine in the sky across a collection of world-class restaurants. Pamper your palate at the Gatsby-esque Horizon Grill, immerse yourself in decadence with an afternoon tea at Altitude or sip and sway to the sounds of the resident DJ at the highest rooftop bar in the city.

You'll be perfectly positioned to explore the very best of Kuala Lumpur, with its historic landmarks, scenic parks and bustling nightspots. Why not begin with a shopping spree at the illustrious Pavillion KL, located just a five-minute stroll away?
offer_address: 2, Jalan Conlay, Kuala Lumpur, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

vendor_name: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Kuala Lumpur
title: Kuala Lumpur Luxury Suites with Award-Winning Day Spa & Rooftop Pool
description: Experience the buzz of Malaysia's capital city when you stay in the heart of the Golden Triangle at Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Kuala Lumpur, a five-star, all-suite, apartment-style escape. Spend balmy days swimming in the rooftop swimming pool on level 24 of the hotel, or opt to kick back on the sunloungers for a mid-afternoon nap. For extra indulgence, book a treatment at the award-winning St. Gregory Spa and revel in high-end pampering from a luxurious spa menu.
location_description: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Kuala Lumpur
offer_address: Jalan Sultan Ismail, Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur 50250, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Kuala Lumpur Luxury with Dining Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
Let The RuMa Hotel and Residences become your five-star home in the heart of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia's vibrant capital. With sweeping city views and a location steps from the Petronas Twin Towers and KLCC mall, this luxe city sanctuary couldn't be closer to the action.

Take a culinary journey at ATAS, the hotel's signature restaurant, spearheaded by Executive Chef Tyson Gee. ATAS' seasonal menu focuses on the freshest local ingredients and authentic herbs and spices, creating stunning dishes such as dry-aged duck breakfast, chicken and waffles, and torched, hand-dived scallops. Indulgent afternoon tea is served at SEVEN Lobby Bar and Lounge, while the pool bar offers handcrafted cocktails. After long city days, find your version of wellness, whether that means sweating it out at the state-of-the-art gym, discovering ancient healing therapies at UR SPA or taking a refreshing dip in the hotel's pool.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Start each day with **daily breakfast** at ATAS or via all-day in-room dining
- Enjoy **MYR100 food and drinks credit** per package
- Enjoy one **signature cocktail per person** (for stays of 2+ nights)
- An **additional MYR50 food and drinks credit** per package (MYR150 total, for stays of 2+ nights)
- Indulge with **afternoon tea for two** at SEVEN Lobby Bar and Lounge (for stays of 3+ nights)

**Suite upgrades available**: Make your stay even more luxurious by upgrading to a Deluxe Suite or Grand Suite, offering spacious living areas and exclusive suite guest benefits such as complimentary nightly drinks and canapés (5.30pm-7.30pm) and butler service.
offer_address: 7, Jalan Kia Peng, Kuala Lumpur, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
